dcsl_miabot_follower_control.cc

00001 #include "ros/ros.h"
00002 #include "ros/console.h"
00003 #include "geometry_msgs/Pose.h"
00004 #include "geometry_msgs/PoseArray.h"
00005 #include "dcsl_miabot_high_level_math.h"
00006 
00009 
00010 // \author Will Scott
00011 
00013 class MiabotFollowerController
00014 {
00015 public:
00016   int numRobots;
00017   ros::NodeHandle n;
00018   ros::Publisher Pub_waypoint;
00019   ros::Subscriber Sub_state;
00020   
00021 public:
00025   MiabotFollowerController(const ros::NodeHandle& node_handle, const int numBots) :
00026       numRobots(numBots),
00027       n(node_handle),
00028       Pub_waypoint(),
00029       Sub_state()
00030   {}
00031 
00034   void init()
00035   {
00036     // create Subscriber and Publisher objects
00037     Sub_state = n.subscribe("state_estimate",1,&MiabotFollowerController::stateCallback,this);
00038     Pub_waypoint =  n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>("waypoint_input", 1);
00039   }
00040 
00047   void stateCallback(const geometry_msgs::PoseArray states)
00048   {
00049     ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("received state message");
00050     if(int(states.poses.size()) == numRobots)
00051     {
00052       geometry_msgs::PoseArray waypoints;
00053       geometry_msgs::Pose currentPose;
00054       double pos[3*numRobots];
00055       double way[3*numRobots];
00056     
00057 
00058       for (int i = 0; i < numRobots; i++) // loop through the robots
00059       {
00060         // collect all poses into single array
00061         pos[3*i + 0] = states.poses[i].position.x;
00062         pos[3*i + 1] = states.poses[i].position.y; 
00063         pos[3*i + 2] = states.poses[i].orientation.z;
00064       }
00065       // call function to compute waypoints as function of current poses
00066       miabot_follower_control(way,pos,numRobots);
00067       for (int i = 0; i < numRobots; i++) // loop through the robots
00068       {
00069         // insert all waypoints into PoseArray to publish
00070         currentPose.position.x    = way[3*i + 0];
00071         currentPose.position.y    = way[3*i + 1]; 
00072         currentPose.orientation.z = way[3*i + 2];
00073         waypoints.poses.push_back(currentPose);
00074       }
00075       ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("  publishing waypoint message");
00076       Pub_waypoint.publish(waypoints);
00077     }
00078     else
00079     {
00080       ROS_ERROR_STREAM("number of states did not match numRobots, skipping...");
00081     }  
00082   }
00083 };
00084 
00085 
00088 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00089 {
00090   // initialize the node, with name miabot_follower_control
00091   ros::init(argc, argv, "miabot_follower_control");
00092 
00093   // create the NodeHandle which tells ROS which node this is
00094   ros::NodeHandle n;
00095 
00096   // collect number of robots from parameter server (default 1)
00097   int numRobots;
00098   n.param<int>("/n_robots", numRobots, 1);
00099 
00100   // create and initialize the controller object
00101   MiabotFollowerController mfc(n, numRobots);
00102   mfc.init();
00103 
00104   // loop through callback queue until node is closed
00105   ros::Rate looprate(5); // 5 hz
00106   while(ros::ok())
00107   {
00108     ros::spinOnce();
00109     looprate.sleep();
00110   }
00111 
00112 
00113   return 0;
00114 }
